briefTitle: Trial of Pemetrexed in Combined With Cisplatin for the Treatment of Advanced Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Trial of Pemetrexed in Combined With Cisplatin for the Treatment of Advanced Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 18-70 years old
* Resistant to enthracycle and taxanes
* Has measurable disease

Exclusion Criteria:

* Has more than 3 previous chemotherapy regimens
